nodes.text: The Rancor Cave was a cave on the remote planet Dathomir, located right next to the Nightsister Stronghold. It was populated by many rancors.
Hidden in the deepest parts of the cave and guarded by Nightsisters lay the entrance to the Chamber of Banishment, where Axkva Min was imprisoned.

The Rancor Cave appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
